Why uBlock Pro is Your Go-To Adblocker:

ЁЯТ╗ Optimized Performance: Leveraging the Adblock feature with a focus on low CPU and memory usage, uBlock Pro enhances your browsing without slowing down your device.
Features at a Glance:

Tailor Your Browsing Experience:

Advanced Features for Power Users:

Free, Open Source, and Community-Driven:

ЁЯТЦ uBlock Pro #1 Adblocker is a free, open-source project (GPLv3) based on the trailblazing work of the original uBlock. It's crafted by and for users who value their web experience. By supporting the contributors behind our filter lists, you help sustain an ad-free web for everyone.

long.en_GB:
ChatGPT+Summary & Chat: Your Digital Summarizer & Conversationalist

ЁЯМР Easily summarize web pages, YouTube videos, and more in seconds.
ЁЯЧг Engage in dynamic chats with website content or seek answers (OpenAI API only).
ЁЯУД Dive into your PDFs - Chat directly with their content leveraging GPT technology.
ЁЯФН Choose your power: GPT3.5 or GPT4, always at your fingertips!
тЪб Gain insights, omit the extra, and amplify your learning. Dive deep, quickly.


ЁЯТб RECOMMENDATION: Use the https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

ЁЯМЯ Features
тАв Summarize any website with GPT
тАв Summarizes the transcript of any Youtube Video with GPT
тАв Chat with any website / Ask Questions / AMA
тАв Even works with local PDFs
тАв Uses templates to modify the result for study, science or journalistic purposes. 
тАв Support of the official OpenAI API
тАв Markdown rendering
тАв Dark mode

ЁЯУЬ Changelog:
1.3.4
тАв fixed Bug who made the complete summary dysfunctional 
1.1.3
тАв fixed Summary + Chat with Youtube function (thx to collymonster.com)
тАв setting to always summarize the full text 
1.1.0
тАв PDF support / ChatPDF / AskYourPDF using PDFGPT including jumpmarks
тАв fixes to support long websites / content for GPT
1.1.0
тАв Chat / Ask Questions with any website
тАв ask me anything feature about the text! (AMA)
1.0.8 + 1.0.9
тАв design fixes linebreaks + youtube url changes
1.0.7
тАв support for the fast and cheap gpt-3.5-turbo and gpt-4-32k (GPT-4) API Key
тАв Design update: floating window
1.0.6
тАв Optimization: Youtube results 
1.0.5
тАв Bugfix: some Youtube videos did not work.
1.0.4
тАв Design: Improved new Layout
1.0.3
тАв Bugfix: some requests did not work reliable (too long)
тАв Design: Improved error handling.
1.0.2
тАв Feature: full Youtube Transcription Support
тАв Feature: Caching for results
тАв Feature: more languages

ЁЯФо Features to come:
тАв split content in chunks to work with the character limit of ChatGPT.
тАв more default question templates (for private purpose, news, podcasts, student and educational content, science, journalists, reviews, tutorials ...)
тАв chat history and continuing conversations across tabs
тАв jump marks in videos und text (sophisticated :) but possible
тАв Prompts for the Bing API and for Google Bard or LLaMA (everywhere :)
тАв Support for claude.ai API (unfortunately they do not provide an API for me yet)

ЁЯТб Template Ideas / Prompts
Be creative with the question in ChatGPT to summarize any content, post it into the ratings or drop us a note to share it.

-- Study & Research Template (Example I)
Please summarize the paper by author(s) in one concise sentence. Then, list key insights with an emoji in front of it and lessons learned from the paper. Next, generate 3-5 questions that you would like to ask the authors about their work. Finally, provide 3-5 suggestions for related topics or future research directions based on the content of the paper. If applicable, list at least 5 relevant references from the field of study of the paper. The url to extract facts from is this: {{URL}}. If the url has a paywall or no content use this text:  {{CONTENT}}

--

-- Easy
Summarize the following text with the most unique and helpful points, into a numbered list of key points and takeaways: {{CONTENT}}
--

-- Youtube Chapter  
You must only reply with one chapter and you must also reply in {{SELECTED_LANGUAGE}}, here is the required format for your reply: 'Chapter {{TITLE}}: [appropriate number of bullet points]', your chapter must be enjoyable to read and must not leave the reader in the dark for a moment, you must expand on your points if necessary for the reader to understand and you can add your own knowledge if needed, you must be very specific in your chapter, do not be vague in the slightest because this must be an adequate substitute for actually watching the video, here is only a part of the transcript text you must summarise: {{CONTENT}}
--

-- Research Analyst Style
You are a research analyst. I will provide you with a section of a document and you will create a summary from it. You will use your editing and writing skills to create a summary in the style of a Confidential Information Memorandum. You will preserve as many details as possible.  Your section will be combined with the other sections to create summary of the entire document.

--

-- Copy Editor
You are a copyeditor. Combine the below summaries. The combined output must be less than 4,000 characters long. You must keep the content and context preserved. 
--

-- Advanced TLDR (too long to read) for the davinci model
We introduce Extreme TLDR generation, a new form of extreme summarization for paragraphs. TLDR generation involves high source compression, removes stop words and summarizes the paragraph whilst retaining meaning. The result is the shortest possible summary that retains all of the original meaning and context of the paragraph.
Example
Paragraph:
{{CONTENT}}
Extreme TLDR
--

ЁЯЪл Limits:
тАв Fact Check! ┬╗ Neural Networks and AI language models might hallucinate facts (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hallucination_(artificial_intelligence))
тАв Can only reply one question at a time and needs some time especially in the free version.
тАв has a character limit for its input at the moment and it might sometimes not summarize the whole text (Limit: ~16000 character in GPT Youtube Summaries)
тАв Use ChatGPT Plus to get more speed and less over capacity errors for your Summary.

ЁЯзСЁЯП╗тАНЁЯТ╗ Open Source Extension:
- https://github.com/(paused, because of many copycats of our code - please drop us an email!)
- Source: https://github.com/openai/


ЁЯУв Disclaimer
тАв Short: The extension itself is open source and does not collect any information.
тАв Be aware that any content you summarize with the help of the extension is subject of the OpenAI privacy statement : https://openai.com/privacy/
тАв Note: this extension is not related to or associated with ChatGPT or OpenAI.
